definitions.definition: Characterized by speculation ; based on guessing , unfounded opinions , or extrapolation .
Pursued as a gamble , with possible large profits or losses; risky .
Pertaining to financial speculation ; Involving or resulting from high-risk investments or trade .

main_definition: Characterized by speculation ; based on guessing , unfounded opinions , or extrapolation .
secondary_definitions: Pursued as a gamble , with possible large profits or losses; risky .
Pertaining to financial speculation ; Involving or resulting from high-risk investments or trade .
